title: Silent e
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 76 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 200L, Fiction Series
description: What happens when your tub becomes a tube? Silent e demonstrates how the letter e can change the sound and meaning of a word when added to the end. It provides illustrated examples throughout the text, as the young superhero zaps the letter e onto the end of words with hilarious results.
reviewWords: change, hears, mean, silent, sound, words
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause and effect
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /w/ sound
grammar: Pronouns : Identify and use the pronoun I
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Understand and arrange words in alphabetical order
